Author: fuckinhelpmehdhd
Text: An additional 10-15 on an already skinny person makes a huge difference. I gained 13 in the last couple of years from excessive stress eating and people who havent seen me in a while have said "wow you used to be sooooo skinny!!!!"

Author: Little_Bear716
Text: Because for a normal person that was a compliment. That’s a normal person way of saying “wow your looking better and healthy”. Because to them a little weight gain when you were underweight before is a win against being unhealthy.   To us it’s an attack. To us it’s pointing our we aren’t ‘thin enough’.   But you’re healthy. 121 seems like a good weight (not sure of your height & body structure). I’m sure you look fine and that you look healthy.   It will be okay. <3
